how_to_use_title: How to Use Our Instagram Downloader
how_to_use_desc: Follow these simple steps to download any Instagram content in just a few clicks
step_1_desc: Open Instagram and find the content you want to download. Tap the three dots (...) and select "Copy link".
step_2_desc: Paste the copied Instagram URL into the input field above. You can also use the paste button for convenience.
step_3_desc: Choose the type of content you want to download: Post, Story, Reel, or Profile picture.
step_4_desc: Click the download button and wait for the process to complete. Your file will be saved automatically.
important_tips_desc: Keep these things in mind for the best experience
tip_public: Only public Instagram content can be downloaded
tip_quality: All content is downloaded in original quality
tip_works_everywhere: Works on mobile, tablet, and desktop
tip_free: Free to use with no hidden costs
